about_the_game:
GAME FEATURES


  • A unique tactical shooting game with God's perspective
  • Test your operation, aim and shoot!
  • Test your command and defeat stronger enemies with smaller casualties
  • Dozens of vehicles, experience navy, army, air force three-dimensional combat
  • Experience different fighting conditions, the whole army charge, brutal fight, desperate blocking
  • Characteristic art style of cartoon low-poly rendering

YOUR TASK


Incarnate as a soldier of the Soviet or German army, do your best for your camp in the war, choose your weapon, you can use a sniper rifle to aim at the enemy officer, you can take a submachine gun as a pioneer, you can use a machine gun to block thousands of troops, you can Drive the tank to crush the enemy's position, but more importantly, you are not fighting alone. Assemble and command your team and fight with you!

CORE GAMEPLAY


1 Campaign mode
Travel through the timeline of history and choose your camp, whether to conquer the European continent or defend your homeland? In this mode, you can experience more than ten elaborate single-player levels based on historical battles. You can use different weapons and equipment, command different teams, and fight for your camp.

2 Custom mode（Available later）
A variety of fun game modes, some have to test your command to complete special operations, and some allow you to experience long-term uninterrupted tug-of-wars and tank battles.

3 Online battle
Tired of single player games? Online battles allow you to fight side by side with your friends, test your skills and cooperation capabilities, and engage in PVE or PVP battles with your opponents.
